name: CVE-2008-4655
description: SQL injection vulnerability in the Simple survey (simplesurvey) 1.7.0 and earlier extension for TYPO3 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via unspecified vectors.
pattern: [((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:typo3:typo3:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:typo3:simplesurvey:1.2.4:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:typo3:simplesurvey:1.2.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:typo3:simplesurvey:1.0.5:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:typo3:simplesurvey:1.5.4:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:typo3:simplesurvey:1.1.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:typo3:simplesurvey:1.2.5:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:typo3:simplesurvey:1.2.2:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:typo3:simplesurvey:1.1.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:typo3:simplesurvey:1.0.3:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:typo3:simplesurvey:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:typo3:simplesurvey:1.4.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:typo3:simplesurvey:1.3.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:typo3:simplesurvey:1.5.3:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:typo3:simplesurvey:1.5.2:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:typo3:simplesurvey:1.2.3:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:typo3:simplesurvey:1.0.2:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:typo3:simplesurvey:1.0.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:typo3:simplesurvey:1.5.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:typo3:simplesurvey:1.5.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:typo3:simplesurvey:1.0.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:typo3:simplesurvey:1.6.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:typo3:simplesurvey:1.3.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:typo3:simplesurvey:1.0.4:*:*:*:*:*:*:*'))]
